body:
Twitter module

Interact with your Twitter account
twitter
Tangler\Module\Twitter\Module

Action: Send tweet action

This action sends a new Tweet
send_tweet
Tangler\Module\Twitter\SendTweetAction
  • oauth.accesstoken (string): Oauth access token
  • oauth.accesstoken.secret (string): Oauth access token secret
  • consumer.key (string): Consumer key
  • consumer.secret (string): Consumer secret
  • message (string): Message contents
